content.title: The Manager Playbook
content.intro_hook: Master the language of leadership on and off the pitch!

core_concept.explanation: In English, the term 'manager' refers to a person responsible for controlling or administering an organization or group. In football, the manager oversees team strategy.
core_concept.analogy: Just as a football manager devises formations, a learner uses grammar rules.

vocabulary_rich.meaning: The person in charge of a football team.
The specific plans used to achieve success.
The arrangement of players on the field.

interactive_engine.scenario_text: Your team is losing 1-0. You need to make a decision. Which is correct?

options.text: We needs to change our formation.

options.feedback: Correct: Proper subject-verb agreement and vocabulary.
